name: bot_added
long_desc: My Slack API Getting started Slack apps Messages Integrations APIs Authentication Keep in touch Helpful resources Compatibility: RTM   The bot_added event is sent to all connections for a team when an integration "bot" is added. Clients can use this to update their local list of bots. If the bot belongs to a Slack app, the event will also include an app_id pointing to its parent app.
